name: Speedball Arena
description: Welcome to the Speedball Arena, where you can be the heroic athlete of the futuristic sports on a lightspeed hoverbike.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: intel(r) core(tm) i5-6200u cpu @ 2.30ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960(VR) / GeForce GTX 550(Non-VR) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6600 cpu @ 3.30ghz Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070(VR) / GeForce GTX 750(Non-VR) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
